last_episode_to_air.name: To Protect and Serve
last_episode_to_air.overview: A police officer's family home is transformed into a spa-like retreat.

name: Extreme Makeover: Home Edition
overview: Host Jesse Tyler Ferguson showcases great stories, inspired volunteers and mind-blowing home renovations for families who give back to their communities. The whole-home overhauls includes interior, exterior and landscaping—all completed within seven days while the family is sent away for the week.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The HGTV spin on Extreme Makeover: Home Edition is scheduled to air in early 2020. The series will showcase great stories, inspired volunteers and mind-blowing home renovations for families who give back to their communities. The whole-home overhauls will include interior, exterior and landscaping—all completed within seven days while the family is sent away for the week.
